attributes.action: Stop the RSPCA abusing its position and slaughtering innocent animals
attributes.additional_details: Currently the RSPCA acts as though it is above the law. ‘Officers’ from the charity intimidate members of the public, break into private property and murder innocent animals they have been given to watch over, seemingly without fear of retribution. Our message is clear; stop the RSPCA abusing its position, stop the RSPCA acting as an unofficial death squad for animals, stop the RSPCA needlessly slaughtering innocent animals without the threat of justice catching up with them.
